title: Fertilizing Carnivorous Plants
content: It is possible to do but it must be done very carefully. Make sure to choose the right type and to dilute it
author: Ryan
comments: Nice tip! I'll look more into this.
Maybe that's why mine isn't looking so good.

title: New Nepenthes Species Discovered!
content: A new species of tropical pitcher plant was discovered in southeast Asia this week!
author: Mike
comments: Crazy that they are still finding new types.
